title: Types of Adoption
text: California law recognizes several types of adoption, including agency adoptions, independent adoptions, and stepparent adoptions.

title: Consent to Adoption
text: Consent to adoption is generally required from the birth parents, the child (if of a certain age), and any other legal guardians.
